ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
TORPEDO leads a dangerous G.I. JOE rescue mission in Olliestan, and the odds are stacked against the teamâ€”will they make the evac in time before they get overwhelmed? A tense game of cat-and-mouse continues in G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero #204!
